title: Elementary Physics Simulation Experiment Design for [Large-Scale] Implementation

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic physics concepts (force, motion, energy, etc.)
context.additional_context: Optimized for online learning environments using digital devices. Experimental design enabling visualization and manipulation of physical phenomena through simulation tools

learning_goals: Can design physics experiment procedures with 80% or higher accuracy using simulation tools
Can apply physics laws (e.g., Newton's laws of motion) in simulation environments to derive predictable outcomes
Can analyze experimental data, organize it in graphs/tables, and logically describe scientific conclusions
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
